text: Reinier Kreijermaat (25 April 1935 â€“ 22 January 2018) was a Dutch footballer. He was active as a midfielder in the 1960s. He was born in Utrecht, the Netherlands. He made his debut for USV Elinkwijk in 1956. He played for Elinkwijk until 1959, when he moved to Dutch heavyweights Feyenoord. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:Sportspeople from Utrecht (city)
title: Reinier Kreijermaat
